data.title: jamal crawford
data.text:
Gillie Da King can hoop. So much so he has gotten nicknames like Damian Gillard. But how will that hold up against a true NBA baller? We are about to find out. Jamal Crawford is ready to join the NBA on TNT team. According to the New York Post, the recently retired guard will takeover Dwyane Wade’s spot on the Tuesday night NBA broadcast, placing him alongside Shaquille O’Neal, Candace Parker and host Adam Lefkoe. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information TNT has not offered a response to […]

Jamal Crawford has not played in the NBA during the 2019-20 season but he will be headed to the Orlando restart. The veteran baller will join the Brooklyn Nets after they have suffered a ton of losses to the roster due to COVID-19 and injuries. It seems like the LA Clippers are just letting their entire heart and soul core of their roster go. First it was CP3, now it’s one of the most beloved 6th man to ever grace the hardwood floor. As Paul Pierce’s NBA career comes to a close, players honor the forward known as “The Truth.” Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information Pierce spent 19 years in the league. He held spots on the Boston Celtics, Brooklyn Nets, and Washington Wizards before ending this season Sunday as a Los Angeles Clipper [April 17, 2017]. Last […]

With Blake Griffin and Chris Paul both sidelined with injuries, the Clippers need all the help that they can get. Visit streaming.thesource.com for more information Insert Jamal Crawford. Thursday night’s game pitting the Los Angeles Clippers against the Portland Trail Blazers came down to the wire as Damian Lillard was able to drain an insane 3 pointer with Chris Paul dropped all over him with 23 seconds left on the clock. Jamal Crawford hit a 3 of his own to tie the game […]

DeAndre Jordan is one of the NBA’s mysteries in terms of how to properly be utilized. He’s athletic enough to be an option on the court, but not good enough to become a primary one. So he’s usually the Los Angeles Clippers resident garbage man; cleaning up missed baskets and opportunities while getting the other […]
